attributes.action: Re-nationalise the Electricity and Gas Supply Industries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Privatisation has failed and the majority of the Great British Public are now paying pro-rata substantially more for energy than when these industries were Publicly owned.
The sectors most crucially involved are Electricity and Gas which should immediately be brought back to Public Ownership.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
